messages.message:
Fortune 10 company needs a Sr. API Developer

Hi Brian, 

Hope you're doing well! Just came across your profile here and wanted to see if you'd be interested in a 1 year contract position with one of our healthcare partners in Las Vegas? 

This position requires Sr. experience developing API's from scratch, RESTful Web Services, ASP.NET, Dependency Injection, and Entity Framework (code first). 

Let me know if you're in a position to consider this opportunity. I know 1 yr contracts can be difficult to consider, but this position will allow remote work after the first month, and the compensation is through the roof. 

Hope to hear from you soon, 

Chris

Chris Allen
702-904-7432
callen@apexsystemsinc.com
Sorry I don't do contracts because I don't want the company to think I am not a part of the team and I am even more disposable than normal.
